mapper.select:
select t1.user_name as userName, t1.user_sex as userSex, t1.user_birthday as userBirthday, t1.user_height as userHeight, t1.user_weight as userWeight, t1.user_native as userNative, t1.user_telephone as userTelephone, t1.user_education as userEducation, t1.user_relationship as userRelationship, t.userinfo_id as userInfoId, t.user_id as userId, t.userInfo_drink as userInfoDrink, t.userInfo_experience as userInfoExperience, t.userInfo_eat as userInfoEat, t.userInfo_sleep as userInfoSleep, t.userInfo_smoking as userInfoSomking, t.userInfo_drugallergy as userInfoDrugallergy, t.userInfo_medicalhistory as userInfoMedicalhistory, t.userInfo_familyhistory userInfoFamilyhistory, t.userInfo_smokenum as userInfoSmokenum, t.otherdisease as otherdisease, sample as sample, t.testitem as testitem, t.personal_case_history as personalCaseHistory, t.personal_case_history2 as personalCaseHistory2, t.personal_case_history3 as personalCaseHistory3, t.personal_case_history4 as personalCaseHistory4, t.userInfo_smoketime as userInfoSmoketime, t.userInfo_quitsmoking as userInfoQuitsmoking, t.userInfo_diploma as userInfoDiploma, t.userInfo_empty_left as userInfoEmptyLeft, t.userInfo_empty_right as userInfoEmptyRight, t.userInfo_corrected_left as userInfoCorrectedLeft, t.userInfo_corrected_right as userInfoCorrectedRight, t.userInfo_ball_left as userInfoBallLeft, t.userInfo_ball_right as userInfoBallRight, t.userInfo_astigmatism_left as userInfoAstigmatismLeft, t.userInfo_astigmatism_right as userInfoAstigmatismRight, t.userInfo_axial_left as userInfoAxialLeft, t.userInfo_axial_right as userInfoAxialRight, t.userInfo_myopiatime as userInfoMyopiatime, t.userInfo_eye_diseases as userInfoEyeDiseases, t.userInfo_eye_name as userInfoEyeName, t.userInfo_intermarriage as userInfoIntermarriage, t.userInfo_genetic as userInfoGenetic, t.userInfo_genetic_name as userInfoGeneticName, t.userInfo_father as userInfoFather, t.mother as mother from t_user t1 left join t_user_info t on t.user_id=t1.user_id where 1=1
and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
